definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of State Council (SASAC)/abbr. to 國資委|国资委[Guo2 Zi1 Wei3]
pinyin: Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Guo2 you3 Zi1 chan3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

definition: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission SASAC
pinyin: Guo2 you3 Zi1 chan3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 国有资产监督管理委员会

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 You3 xian4 Xin1 wen2 Wang3

sentences.english: State-owned enterprises are the pillar of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 国有企业是我国国民经济的支柱。

sentences.english: Will governments in the region maintain and even increase state ownership of financial institutions?
sentences.chinese: 这些地区的政府会保持甚至增容其国有金融机构吗？

sentences.english: Stock company is the form of realization of state-owned enterprises at the operational level.
sentences.chinese: 股份制企业是国有企业在经营层次上的实现形式。

sentences.english: This requirement will gradually expand to include smaller public companies in the future.
sentences.chinese: 这一要求将在未来逐步扩展到包含更小的国有公司。

sentences.english: Sites owned by search engine optimizers are not accepted.
sentences.chinese: 通过搜索引擎优化国有土地没有被接受。

sentences.english: This suggests that state acquirers tend to have a stronger tunneling incentive.
sentences.chinese: 这表明国有收购方有更强的激励趋向于操作隧道挖掘。

sentences.english: Non-state-owned industries continuously maintained a fast growth tendency.
sentences.chinese: 非国有工业继续保持较快增长势头。

sentences.english: State-owned newspapers have been ordered to downplay the story.
sentences.chinese: 国有的新闻报纸被下令对钱案进行低调处理。

sentences.english: The bank is in effect nationalised.
sentences.chinese: 该银行实际上是国有化了。

sentences.english: For one thing ， urgent measures are required to resolve problems involving state-owned enterprises .
sentences.chinese: 一方面，需要紧要方法解决涉及国有企业的问题。

sentences.english: The state farms were semi-military in character.
sentences.chinese: 那些国有农场从性质上讲是半军事的。

sentences.english: Beijing also announced the removal of constraints on lending by state-owned commercial bank.
sentences.chinese: 北京还宣布，取消国有商业银行的贷款限制。

sentences.english: Nationalizing banks is not without precedent.
sentences.chinese: 银行国有化并非无先例可循。

sentences.english: The final solution should be the deepening reform and improved efficiency of the state-owned enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 国有企业的深化及效率的提高才是本。

sentences.english: Jiang Zhigang was appointed Vice-Chairman of State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration.
sentences.chinese: 姜志刚任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会副主任。

sentences.english: Song is state-owned farmer Tian Li turns the soil in course of.
sentences.chinese: 宋国有个农夫正在田里翻土。

definition: privately run (i.e. by a company, not the state)
state enterprise/(Tw) abbr. for 國際企業管理|国际企业管理, international business management (as a subject of study)
centrally-managed state-owned enterprise (PRC), abbr. for 中央企業|中央企业[zhong1 yang1 qi3 ye4]
abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
ownership of the means of production (in Marxism)/system of ownership
